# Scoreboards & Checkers — Verifying Streaming Protocols

Streaming protocols need strong checkers and scoreboards to ensure ordering, no drops, and no duplicates. This post explains how to construct monitors, reference models, and scoreboards.

## Approach
- Transactionize signals in monitors.
- Maintain expected queues and compare observed transactions.
- Log contextual diagnostics for mismatches.

## Example approach (pseudo)
```
expected_q.push(expected_txn);
on observed:
 if (expected_q.empty) -> report unexpected;
 else if (observed != expected_q.peek) -> report mismatch;
 else -> expected_q.pop();
```
